item.title: Easy math multi-choice(a,b,c, or d)
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You really should try and do your homework yourself…

  1. Is the second equation: 2x - y = 4?? If so, its C, infinitely many solutions since they can be reduced to the same thing. If it was 2x + y = 4, then the solution isn’t up there.

  2. A

  3. Its hard to see the letter, but I believe its A

  4. B - they’re parallel

  5. D - they’re the same line

  6. D - that’s where they intersect

  7. A

  8. If I read it properly, B

  9. C

Read full topic
